name: kickstarter-static
description: Kickstarter for a simple static site build
author: Lee Marsden

scripts.css: npm run stylelint && npm run sass && npm run postcss:autoprefixer && npm run postcss:vr && npm run postcss:pxtorem && npm run postcss:focus && npm run postcss:mqpacker
scripts.js: eslint src/js/**/*.js && mkdir -p dist/js && browserify src/js/main.js -o dist/js/main.js -t [ babelify ]
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && parallelshell 'npm run html' 'npm run css' 'npm run js' 'npm run images' 'npm run images:css'
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:dev && parallelshell 'npm run htmlMin' 'npm run postcss:csso' 'npm run uglify'
scripts.serve: browser-sync start --server 'dist' --files 'dist/*.html, dist/css/*.css, dist/css/images/*, dist/js/*.js, dist/images/*'
scripts.serve:dev: npm run build:dev && parallelshell 'npm run serve' 'npm run watch:html' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:images' 'npm run watch:imagesCss'
scripts.serve:prod: npm run build:prod && npm run serve
